=== Overview ===

LVAD is an organization that teaches programming to youth and teens. Perhaps we can engage with such group to achieve exposure to the young and teen audiences.

Website: http://p4y.lvadonline.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=92331557330&v=info
=== Detail ===

LVAD is an organization that teaches programming to youth and teens, they do their work under supervision of some charity organization in Haram IIRC. Perhaps we can engage with them by providing basic Linux courses in addition to persuading them to use FOSS in their work.
 
=== Resources Required ===

# Volunteers, Volunteers, Volunteers.
# Remastered LiveCDs with TuxPaint, TuxMath ... etc. pre-installed.
# Education materials (Already prepared)
# Printed materials (prepared by our volunteers, may be printed by P4Y)
